meanings.definition: A tropical disease caused by parasitic worms transmitted by mosquitoes.
meanings.sent1: Filariasis can be prevented by using mosquito nets.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with filariasis after conducting blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The mosquitoes in the tropical forest were spreading filariasis like a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: The spread of misinformation was like filariasis, infecting the minds of the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the worms causing filariasis burrowed into her mind, haunting her dreams.

meanings.definition: The presence of filarial worms in the body.
meanings.sent1: The filariasis in his body caused swelling in his legs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed the filariasis after examining the blood sample.
meanings.sent3: The filarial worms in his body were having a party, causing chaos inside.
meanings.sent4: The filariasis in his body felt like a tangled mess of wires, disrupting his system.
meanings.sent5: The presence of filariasis in his body was like an unwelcome guest, overstaying its welcome.
